name: nimio.us
tagline: Extravagant packages for the Nim programming language
body:
### Support
Please submit pull requests on GitHub or email us at info@nimio.us if any of our packages are out of date or contain bugs. All other related problems are best handled through _nimious_ tagged [StackOverflow](http://stackoverflow.com/questions/tagged/nimious) questions. You may also find us in the official [Freenode IRC](http://webchat.freenode.net/?channels=nimlang) channel for the Nim programming language community.

### About
_nimio.us_ was founded by _Gerke Max Preussner_ in December 2014 with the goal to promote and spread the [Nim](http://nim-lang.org) programming language. Nim is a modern, statically typed, imperative and cross-platform systems programming language that gives programmers ultimate power without compromises on runtime efficiency.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
